actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish within the Department of the Interior the position of an additional Assistant Secretary of the Interior.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to appoint, by and with the advice and consent of the Senate, an Assistant Secretary of the Interior for Indian Affairs. Sets forth changes to existing laws as required by the replacement of the position of Commissioner of Indian Affairs by the position of Assistant Secretary of the Interior for Indian Affairs.

titles.title: A bill to establish within the Department of the Interior the position of an additional Assistant Secretary of the Interior.
